title: Unlock Champions
body: I've been planning to buy Master Yi, but when I try to buy him all that comes up is the unlock button.  When I click it, nothing happens.  But when I hover over it, it says not implemented yet. Is it because I'm on a Mac?  I'm really confused

replies.body: I think you're looking him up through your Collections tab, which doesn't have a purchase unlock available yet.  You'll want to instead navigate through the Store link, which is next to your IP/RP balance on the client.  Let me know if that helps!
I swear I'm blind. Thanks for the help man! Hope you enjoy the rest of ur day <3
